text: The 2010–11 New York Knicks was the 65th season of the New York Knicks in the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==Key dates== *June 24 – The 2010 NBA Draft took place in New York City. *July 1 – The free agency period started. ==Draft picks== Round Pick Player Position Nationality College 2 38 Andy Rautins Shooting Guard Syracuse 2 39 Landry Fields Swingman Stanford ==Roster== ===Depth chart=== Pos. ===Awards=== *On November 22, Amar'e Stoudemire was named Eastern Conference Player of the Week (November 15–November 21). *On December 6, Amar'e Stoudemire was named Eastern Conference Player of the Week (November 24-December 3). *On December 1, Landry Fields was named Eastern Conference Rookie of the Month (October 26 though November)http://www.nba.com/2010/news/12/01/landry-fields-blake-griffin-rookies-of-month/index.html?rss=true *On January 3, Landry Fields was named Eastern Conference Rookie of the Month (Games played through December)http://www.nba.com/2011/news/01/03/december-2010-rookies-of-the-month/index.html ===Records=== ===Milestones=== ==Transactions== ===Trades=== July 9, 2010 To Golden State Warriors * * * * David Lee (sign and trade) To New York Knicks * * * * Kelenna Azubuike * Anthony Randolph * Ronny Turiaf *Cash considerations July 9, 2010 To Phoenix Suns * * * *Protected future second-round pick To New York Knicks * * * * Amar'e Stoudemire (sign and trade) February 22, 2011 To Denver Nuggets * * * * Wilson Chandler * Raymond Felton * Danilo Gallinari * Timofey Mozgov *Future first-round pick *Two future second-round picks *Cash considerations To New York Knicks * * * * Carmelo Anthony * Renaldo Balkman * Chauncey Billups * Anthony Carter * Sheldon Williams February 22, 2011 To Minnesota Timberwolves * * * * Eddy Curry * Anthony Randolph *Cash considerations To New York Knicks * * * * Corey Brewer ===Free agents=== ====Additions==== Player Signed Former Team Amar'e Stoudemire Signed 5-year contract for $100 Million Phoenix Suns Timofey Mozgov Signed 3-year contract for $9.7 Million Khimki Moscow Region Raymond Felton Signed 2-year contract for $15.8 Million Charlotte Bobcats
